title: Crossing The Line
description: Sergeant Nathan Thompson lost his leg in Afghanistan. Megan hides a secret. When they are assigned as a paramedic team, tensions flare—Nathan thinks Megan is a condescending know it all, and Megan resents a partner who might not be able to offer 100%.As they respond to calls, their mutual respect grows. Then Nathan notices the bruises appearing on Megan's arms, and her excuses don't add up. The next life Nathan must save may be that of his own partner—if only she'll let him.
author: Caitlyn Armistead
